Class activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • fitnessApp.dbConnection
      • fitnessApp.activity

  • public class activity
extends dbConnection
    This class extends the dbConnection class to connect to the EXERCISE Table in the database

    12/5/18
    Author:
    Carson Uecker-Herman

      • insert

        public static void insert(java.lang.String date,
                          java.lang.String type,
                          java.lang.String duration,
                          double distance,
                          double calsBurned)
        Inserts data the passed parameters into the Exercise table
        Parameters:
        date - date of occurence in format yyyy-MM-dd
        type - type of activity
        duration - length of activity in miles
        distance - distance of activtity in the format HH:mm:ss
        calsBurned - amount of calories burned
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - could not execute SQL statement
